comments.html: If you like hosting stuff, I can recommend paperless-ngx

You can make Obsidian work with PDFs and have them searchable via plugins. Just don't try to do a lot of that searching via mobile in the current state of the program. They promise they are working on it. (I''m an Evernote to Obsidian convert)
I was going to say DevonThink, but that is for Mac. However, perhaps you could try the server edition?
I have this in my starred GitHub repo: https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx, but I haven't tried it yet.
